data.title: Everett Dunbar Marvin Jr.
data.meta_description: MARVIN Everett Dunbar Jr. 71 died in Houston Tx. Dec. 4, born in Woodbury, Ct. & resided in Norman, Ok. for 25 years. \
data.text:
MARVIN Everett Dunbar Jr. 71 died in Houston Tx. Dec. 4, born in Woodbury, Ct. & resided in Norman, Ok. for 25 years. "Terry" graduated from Yale University in 1942, served in WWI as a B-29 pilot. He was employed by Kerr McGee. Survived by his wife of 47 years Phillis, 5 children; Everett Marvin III, Ellen Marvin Colon, John Marvin, Whitney Marvin, Angela Marvin Pettit & 8 grandchildren. Memorial service was held in Houston, Tx. Dec. 5, another service planned in Norman, date not yet determined. BIOG: NAME:

Archive ID: 487222
